articles.title: New Juniper Junos OS Flaws Expose Devices to Remote Attacks - Patch Now - The Hacker News
articles.description: JuniperNetworks released an "out-of-cycle" security patch for Junos OS. Attackers could remotely execute code by chaining these vulnerabilities.
